questions.question: What does a red traffic light signal mean?
questions.explanation: A red traffic light means you must stop completely before reaching the intersection.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers of potential hazards or changes in road conditions ahead.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection with no traffic signals or signs?
options: The car that is going straight
questions.explanation: At an intersection with no traffic signals or signs, the vehicle on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on most Hawaii highways under normal conditions?
questions.explanation: The maximum posted speed limit on most Hawaii highways is 55 mph under normal conditions.

questions.question: Where is it illegal to park?
options: Within 15 feet of a fire hydrant
On the right side of the road facing traffic
questions.correctAnswer: Within 15 feet of a fire hydrant
questions.explanation: In Hawaii, it is illegal to park within 15 feet of a fire hydrant.

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle starts to skid on a wet road?
options: Steer in the opposite direction of the skid
Steer in the direction of the skid
questions.correctAnswer: Steer in the direction of the skid
questions.explanation: If your vehicle starts to skid, steer in the direction of the skid to regain control.
